title: Avoid these popular gold stocks (Ep. 718)
itunes:title: Avoid these popular gold stocks
description: We all know the coronavirus is shaking the markets. But you might not know that there’s a big disconnect between Wall Street and Main Street right now… and it’s one we should all be paying attention to. John Petrides, portfolio manager at Tocqueville Asset Management, returns to the podcast to discuss the current environment… and some of his favorite ideas right now. [25:05] Gold has been on an amazing ride recently—the price of the yellow metal has moved to within 10% of its all-time highs. But, while some companies will benefit as gold moves to record highs… there are certain stocks you should avoid at all cost… [50:13] -------------------------------- Enjoyed this episode?
